game.name: Crossing Damaged Bridge
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Crossing Damaged Bridge is an exciting game designed for those who love extreme adventures. The game takes you on a thrilling journey, where the roads are full of potholes and obstacles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Crossing Damaged Bridge is an exciting game designed for those who love extreme adventures. The game takes you on a thrilling journey, where the roads are full of potholes and obstacles.
